column2: "Welcome back! Did you find the beautiful blue pigment I asked for?"
"Wow, look at all this data! It's all glowing so beautifully... That bright blue color really pops!"
"Seeing these samples has really helped me get a solid idea of the color I want to aim for!"
"I'm going to try, try and try again until I can recreate this beautiful blue color! Thank you for your help!"
